skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: honda
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Control your Honda vehicle with the sound of your voice. Instruct your Honda vehicle to start remotely, unlock and lock doors, flash vehicle lights, send an address to your Honda and so much more.

Supported Vehicles:
• 2018-2022 Accord Touring
• 2023 and newer Accord
• 2018 and newer Odyssey Touring/Elite
• 2019 and newer Insight Touring
• 2019 and newer Pilot Touring/Elite/Black Edition
• 2019 and newer Passport Touring/Elite
• 2023 and newer Civic Type R
• 2023 and newer CR-V Sport Touring Hybrid

For the most up to date list, go to www.hondalink.com

Set Up:
• Enable the Honda Skill
• Login with your HondaLink® credentials and link to your Amazon Alexa account
• Select the vehicle you wish to interact with
• Agree to the Terms of Use
• Start using the Honda Skill

The Honda Skill allows you to give commands, such as:

Engine Start
“Alexa, ask Honda to start my engine.”

Extend Engine Start
“Alexa, ask Honda to keep my vehicle running.”

Lock Doors*
“Alexa, ask Honda to lock my doors.”

Unlock Door*
“Alexa, ask Honda to unlock my door.”

Flash Lights*
“Alexa, ask Honda to flash my lights.”

Flash Lights & Sound Horn*
“Alexa, ask Honda to flash the lights and sound the horn.”

Fuel Level & Drive Range
“Alexa, ask Honda how much fuel do I have?”

Odometer Information
“Alexa, ask Honda how many miles are on my car?”

Oil Life
“Alexa, ask Honda what is my oil life?”

Warning Lamp Information
“Alexa, ask Honda if I have any warning lamps on.”

Maintenance Minder Information
“Alexa, ask Honda is my car due for maintenance?”

Search for Generic Point of Interest (POI)
“Alexa, ask Honda to look for nearest (POI).”

Search for Specific POI & Send to Car
“Alexa, ask Honda for directions to (POI).”

Send Address to Car
“Alexa, ask Honda to send an address to my vehicle.”

Basic Information on HondaLink
“Alexa, ask Honda what is HondaLink®?”

Help
“Alexa, ask Honda to help.”

*Features Available Only for 2023 Accord 
Engine Start with Temperature 
“Alexa, ask Honda to start my engine and set temperature to 70.” 
“Alexa, ask Honda to start my engine and set temperature to normal.” 
You can give your vehicle a temperature between 58 and 86 Fahrenheit or cold, normal, or warm. 
 
Engine Start with Climate Control Dialog 
To activate more than one climate control feature: 
“Alexa, ask Honda to start my engine and set climate controls.” 
The skill will prompt you to set climate controls. 
 
Engine Start with a Climate Control Feature 
“Alexa, ask Honda to start my engine with my front defroster on.” 
“Alexa, ask Honda to start my engine with my heated driver’s seat at high.” 

If your vehicle has the features Alexa-enabled, you may set front and rear defroster on or off; you may set heated driver’s and passenger’s seat low, medium, or high. 

Engine Start with Temperature and a Climate Control Feature 
“Alexa, ask Honda to start my engine and set temperature to 70 with rear defroster on.” 


*Skill feature only available when your linked vehicle is off.

Disclaimers:
• A Remote trial or paid subscription package is required to use this Skill.
• Remote engine start and extending engine runtime is not available for 2019 and newer Pilot and Passport models.
• To protect access to certain Skill features, such as remote start, extend engine start, lock, unlock, and horn, your HondaLink® four digit PIN must be provided each time before Alexa can send the command to Honda.
• It is recommended to only use this Skill in a secure and private setting.
• Only one vehicle can be linked to the Honda Skill.
• Skill success for remote commands is heavily dependent on the vehicle being in an area with adequate cellular data connection.
• Commands may take anywhere from five to sixty (5-60) seconds to execute, depending on network conditions.
• For assistance, please visit: https://automobiles.honda.com/information/customer-relations#contact-us
